downloadTitle: Lync 2013 and Avaya Aura 6.1 Integration Guide
downloadDescription: This paper describes integrating Lync Server 2013 and Avaya Aura Session Manager 6.1.
detailsSection:
This paper provides steps for configuring:
  • Avaya Communication Server 1000E--including node and key IP address, D-Channel, routes, trunks, dialing plans, and numbering plans;
  • The Avaya Aura Session Manager--including adding domains, locations, adaptations, SIP entities, routing policies, and dialing patterns; and
  • Lync Server--including configuration of trunks, routes, voice policies and PSTN usage, dial plans, and media bypass.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
